column4: ok so i want to be able to remote into a user's computer so i can help them
i got nx installed and working, but it always creates a new session
how can i view the current session?
tar is not compressed, just concatenated
i know what i'm talking about
and i don't even know where to start with that
screen... what does that mean to me?
you run something in screen and then can reattach to that same session later.
like everyone else is telling you, use vnc
